result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: The old barracks are in public ownership now.
result.ga: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anois
result.orig: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anois
result.html: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anoisThe old barracks are in public ownership now.

result.eng: The media are owned by the rich.
result.ga: Tá na meáin chumarsáide i seilbh lucht an rachmais
result.orig: Tá na meáin chumarsáide i seilbh lucht an rachmais
result.html: Tá na meáin chumarsáide i seilbh lucht an rachmaisThe media are owned by the rich.
result.ponchtml: Tá na meáin ċumarsáide i seilḃ luċt an raċmaisThe media are owned by the rich.

result.eng: Most of the country's businesses are in private ownership.
result.ga: Tá an chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí na tíre i seilbh phríobháideach
result.orig: Tá an chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí na tíre i seilbh phríobháideach

result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó de ġnólaċtaí na tíre i seilḃ ṗríoḃáideaċMost of the country's businesses are in private ownership.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: Voters prefer candidates who already have power.

result.eng: The player was in possession of the ball.

result.eng: The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.

result.eng: The waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
